title: CEP Campaign Finance Expenditure Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of campaign finance expenditures.

terms.label: Advertising
terms.definition: Payments for advertising, including print, broadcast, digital, and outdoor media placements.

terms.label: Consulting and Professional Services
terms.definition: Payments for consulting, legal, accounting, polling, research, and other professional services.

terms.label: Salaries and Benefits
terms.definition: Payments for staff salaries, wages, benefits, and payroll taxes.

terms.label: Travel and Lodging
terms.definition: Payments for travel, lodging, transportation, and related expenses.

terms.label: Fundraising Costs
terms.definition: Payments for fundraising events, solicitations, and fundraising-related consulting or services.

terms.label: Contribution to Other Committee
terms.definition: Contributions or transfers made from this committee to another committee.

terms.label: Independent Expenditure
terms.definition: An expenditure expressly advocating the election or defeat of a clearly identified candidate, made without coordination.

terms.label: Compliance and Reporting
terms.definition: Payments related to regulatory compliance, recordkeeping, and reporting obligations.

terms.label: Refund to Donor or Payer
terms.definition: Refunds issued to contributors, vendors, or other payees.

terms.label: Other Expenditure
terms.definition: An expenditure that does not fit any more specific category in this vocabulary.
